title: Financial Stability and Shadow Banks: What We Don�t Know Could Hurt Us
content: For release on delivery  1:10 p.m. EST   December 3, 2015      Financial Stability and Shadow Banks:   What We Don’t Know Could Hurt Us    Remarks by     Stanley Fischer     Vice Chairman     Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System     at     “Financial Stability:  Policy Analysis and Data Needs”   2015 Financial Stability Conference   sponsored by the Federal Reserve Bank of Cleveland and the Office of Financial Research     Washington, D.C.                 December 3, 2015
